segments.text: Hello , My name is Candy Brown . May I have your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Candy . My name is Jim White . Nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet you , too . Where are you from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm from New Orleans . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? This is a beautiful town .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's nice talking to you . But I have to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Can I have your phone number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . It's 15066688866 . Call me ! Bye-bye , then .
segments.speaker: S1
